name: Escape planet X (aleded32)
description:
This is a project created in my second year of uni in 2021. 

It's a 2D platformer with a twist as you traverse the mysterious planet only known as X, different species and dangers lie await preventing you from leaving. 

Using unique controls, try to move through each section in as few moves as possible to get the lowest score!

This prototype was created in a short amount of time to coincide with a university assignment. I hope you enjoy it!
